title: Beyond the Edge
writer: Aleksandr Boguslavskiy (participation), Francesco Cinquemani, Aleksandra Primachenko (participation), Aleksey Slushchev (participation), Dmitriy Zhigalov (participation), Mikhail Zubko
actors: Lyubov Aksyonova, Maksim Al-Names, Anastasiya Anikhovskaya, Sergey Astakhov
plot: Contemporary Moscow. A talented gambler gathers a team of people with superpowers to win big at a casino. But at the game he finds himself up against a much stronger mystical rival and ends up in a deadlock putting in danger himself and his team that he has grown to love. To save his friends and his girlfriend the lead character will have to go above and beyond.
name: Beyond the Edge
